description:
HELENKAY DIMON is an award-winning author of more than a dozen novels and novellas. Her first single title, Your Mouth Drives Me Crazy, was excerpted in Cosmopolitan magazine in August ’07 and spotlighted at E! Online. Her books have also been translated into several languages.
After 12 years as a divorce lawyer specializing in unhappy endings, HelenKay now writes romance for a living. She calls herself a “recovering lawyer” and is grateful every day for the ability to write.
name: HelenKay Dimon
